mapper.select: SELECT TOPIC.`NO`, TOPIC.`TITLE`, USER.NICKNAME FROM TOPIC LEFT JOIN USER ON TOPIC.USER_NO = USER.NO WHERE `DELYN` = 'N'
SELECT TOPIC_NO FROM USER_TOPIC AS a JOIN USER AS b ON a.USER_NO = b.NO JOIN TOPIC AS c ON a.TOPIC_NO = c.`NO` WHERE a.USER_NO = ${value}
SELECT COUNT(*) as `count` FROM USER_TOPIC AS a JOIN USER AS b ON a.USER_NO = b.NO WHERE a.USER_NO = ${id} AND a.TOPIC_NO = ${topic_no}
